location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 1018 from William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to Robert Taylor, Political Agent at Bussorah [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter informs the Political Agent that he is to be considered subordinate to the Resident in the Persian Gulf in matters respecting the maritime Arabs, the inhabitants of the Persian coast, and the wider Gulf.It is possible that this letter was once an enclosure to another letter addressed the Resident in the Persian Gulf, if so this letter has been removed from the file.
